name: part_005
file: tmp_【 #さくらみこ3D新衣装 】ゲストあり！3D新衣装お披露目LIVE ⧸ New outfit LIVE【ホロライブ⧸さくらみこ】 [jYQdvWQ20O0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Sakura Miko says goodbye to guests Momosuzu Nene and Nakiri Ayame, then transitions to the next song.
Sakura Miko performs "Hyakka Ryouran Waga Hakusetsu" with Shirakami Fubuki and Ookami Mio.
MC section after the song where Miko explains her costume choice, and Fubuki and Mio tease her.

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、ねねちとあやめ様に来てもらいました。
subtitles.english: Yes! So, I had Nene-chi and Ayame-sama come over.

subtitles.original: あり〜！ありがとう〜！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thanks!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました。じゃあ、次の曲行きます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much. Now, on to the next song!

subtitles.original: ありがとね〜。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: 頑張ってね〜。
subtitles.english: Good luck.

subtitles.original: バイバイ〜。
subtitles.english: Bye-bye.

subtitles.original: バイバイ〜。
subtitles.english: Bye-bye.

subtitles.original: それじゃ、次の曲行くぞ〜！
subtitles.english: Well then, on to the next song!

subtitles.original: 色づく想い 刹那 百花繚乱花吹雪
subtitles.english: Coloured feelings, a momentary profusion of flowers, a blizzard of petals

subtitles.original:
百花繚乱我若吹雪
作詞・作曲：武田将弥 (Dream Monster)
subtitles.english:
Hyakka Ryouran Waga Hakusetsu
Lyrics/Composition: Masaya Takeda (Dream Monster)

subtitles.original: パッと咲いて散った花は 終末を告げてく
subtitles.english: Flowers that bloomed and fell in an instant tell of the end

subtitles.original: その時は待てど暮らせど 事は進まず
subtitles.english: No matter how long I wait, things don't progress

subtitles.original: そっと触れてしまった 胸の内の暖かさを
subtitles.english: The warmth inside my chest that I gently touched

subtitles.original: 初めてのこの気持ちだけ 抱きしめていた
subtitles.english: I was just holding onto this first-time feeling

subtitles.original: 暁 交わした約束は
subtitles.english: The promise exchanged at dawn

subtitles.original: 本物だってきっと 信じてる
subtitles.english: I'm sure it's real, I believe

subtitles.original: いろはにほへと の花に 魅せられた 蝶々たち
subtitles.english: Butterflies captivated by the flowers of the world

subtitles.original: あぁ はらり はらり はらり 落ちる花と舞い踊れ
subtitles.english: Ah, dance with the flowers falling flutteringly

subtitles.original: 若よ誰そ でも想い 言の葉に込めてみた
subtitles.english: Who goes there? But I tried to put my feelings into words

subtitles.original: 誰も皆 憧れる 現世のことわりよ
subtitles.english: The truth of this transient world that everyone longs for

subtitles.original: 色づく想い 刹那 百花繚乱花吹雪
subtitles.english: Coloured feelings, a momentary profusion of flowers, a blizzard of petals

subtitles.original: ふっと吹き消した 夜を灯す 月明かりに
subtitles.english: In the moonlight that lights up the night I suddenly blew out

subtitles.original: 曖昧な心が揺れて 声は震わす
subtitles.english: My ambiguous heart wavers, my voice trembles

subtitles.original: もっと触れたくて 夢を辿る指先まで
subtitles.english: Wanting to touch more, right down to the fingertips following the dream

subtitles.original: いつか褪せた形を 忘れかけていた
subtitles.english: I was starting to forget the form that faded away one day

subtitles.original: 浮世の波に たゆたう時
subtitles.english: When swaying in the waves of the fleeting world

subtitles.original: うたかたの夢は 弾けてく
subtitles.english: The transient dreams burst open

subtitles.original: 有為の奥山に 荒れる想いたちは 純情も
subtitles.english: The feelings raging in the deep mountains of existence, even innocence

subtitles.original: そのなれの果てに心揺らめき歌は告げるか
subtitles.english: Does the heart waver and the song tell of its ruined state?

subtitles.original: 浅き夢見じと想い 踏み込むこの世界は
subtitles.english: Entering this world with the thought of not dreaming shallow dreams

subtitles.original: 誰も皆 憧れる 現世のことわりよ
subtitles.english: The truth of this transient world that everyone longs for

subtitles.original: 色づく想い 刹那 百花繚乱花吹雪
subtitles.english: Coloured feelings, a momentary profusion of flowers, a blizzard of petals

subtitles.original: ひふみ数えて
subtitles.english: Counting one, two, three

subtitles.original: ここにおいで
subtitles.english: Come here

subtitles.original: 暁 交わした約束は
subtitles.english: The promise exchanged at dawn

subtitles.original: 本物だってきっと 信じてる
subtitles.english: I'm sure it's real, I believe

subtitles.original: いろはにほへと の花に 魅せられた 蝶々たち
subtitles.english: Butterflies captivated by the flowers of the world

subtitles.original: あぁ はらり はらり はらり 落ちる花と舞い踊れ
subtitles.english: Ah, dance with the flowers falling flutteringly

subtitles.original: 若よ誰そ でも想い 言の葉に込めてみた
subtitles.english: Who goes there? But I tried to put my feelings into words

subtitles.original: 誰も皆 憧れる 現世のことわりよ
subtitles.english: The truth of this transient world that everyone longs for

subtitles.original: 色づく想い 刹那 百花繚乱花吹雪
subtitles.english: Coloured feelings, a momentary profusion of flowers, a blizzard of petals

subtitles.original: 風に舞う 乙女の純情 咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: A maiden's innocence dancing in the wind, bloom in full glory

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Haaay!

subtitles.original: ということで。
subtitles.english: So.

subtitles.original: あれ？なんか一人違うな。
subtitles.english: Huh? One of us is different.

subtitles.original: あれ？なんか...あれ？
subtitles.english: Huh? Something's... eh?

subtitles.original: え、なんか違う？違くないよ！
subtitles.english: Eh, something's different? It's not!

subtitles.original: どうも皆さん、いろはにほへと みこはばみこです！
subtitles.english: Hello everyone, I'm Irohanihoheto Miko-haba-miko!

subtitles.original: あれ、なんか違うな。
subtitles.english: Huh, something's different.

subtitles.original: なんか違くないか？
subtitles.english: Isn't something different?

subtitles.original: 巫女だよ！
subtitles.english: I'm a shrine maiden!

subtitles.original: 余白さ、お前どこやったんだよ！
subtitles.english: Yohaku (Ayame), where did you put her!

subtitles.original: どこやったんだよ！
subtitles.english: Where did you put her!

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、あの、やっぱり憧れを持ってましてね。
subtitles.english: Well, you see, I've always admired it.

subtitles.original: みこもほら、神社だしさ。
subtitles.english: Miko is from a shrine too, you know.

subtitles.original: まあ確かにそれはある。
subtitles.english: Well, that's true.

subtitles.original: 巫女さんだしさ。
subtitles.english: And a shrine maiden.

subtitles.original: 確かにな。
subtitles.english: True.

subtitles.original: 鬼ではないけどさ。
subtitles.english: I'm not an ogre, though.

subtitles.original: 親和性はあるかなと思って、ちょっと叶えさせていただきましたね。
subtitles.english: But I thought there was an affinity, so I decided to fulfill my wish.

subtitles.original: まあまあまあ。
subtitles.english: Well, well.

subtitles.original: そうだね。
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: さっきまであやめちゃんもいたんだよ。
subtitles.english: Ayame-chan was here just now too.

subtitles.original: そうだね。
subtitles.english: That's right.
